title: ‘Disgraceful attack’: Shashi Tharoor condemns vandalism of 1971 Indian memorial statues
selftext: The agenda of some agitators is quite clear, Shashi Tharoor says, referring to attacks on Hindu temples and minority areas in Bangladesh.
comments: Army is letting the chaos fester in hopes of gaining the political power to take power
